name.title: Name for App: Marketing Only App

description.title: Description for App: Marketing Only App
description.value: Bring your Zendesk into your other service

long_description.title: Long Description for App: Marketing Only App
long_description.value: Zendesk for Marketing Only App allows you to integrate your Zendesk Support helpdesk with your other service.

installation_instructions.title: Installation Instructions for App: Marketing Only App
installation_instructions.value: Visit the Plugin Directory [here](http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/zendesk/installation/) to download and install the plugin.
